entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump There are now 1,191,965 cases of #COVID19 in the #USA &68,715 #American deaths. And #PsychopathTrump wants to boast about how well he has done handling the virus? No #empathy or compassion for the victims at all.  

#GoJoe #GoJoe2020 #Biden2020 #MoJoe #Biden #GoJoe2020
